title: Rengar Night Hunter
body: The Night Hunter skin for Rengar is missing the VFX on his ultimate ability since the rework/update to his q.

replies.body: Hi hi! To follow up, we've got a fix in for this that should be hitting PBE today. The overlay wasn't appearing when you loaded in on Chaos, but was working a-okay when you loaded in on the Order side of the map. If all goes well, we'll have a fix ready for 8.7. :)
I appreciate the follow up :) Will have a designer look at this and try to get the fix in quickly!

Hey Homie!

What VFX are taking a look at it and I do not see what's missing. Could you send me a picture or be a little bit more descriptive please :D

Thank you!

It appears this bug has been around since the assassin rework. When Rengar uses R the blue-ish "dimming" effect, like in Skin Spotlights, is absent. The screen does not change shading at all. The bug didn't happen when I tried to recreate it in practice tool but in my last game it was apparent.
